name: SubtleCrypto.decrypt
description: The decrypt() method of the SubtleCrypto interface decrypts some encrypted data. It takes as arguments a key to decrypt with, some optional extra parameters, and the data to decrypt (also known as "ciphertext"). It returns a Promise which will be fulfilled with the decrypted data (also known as "plaintext").

refs.name: Web Cryptography API
refs.description: The definition of 'SubtleCrypto.decrypt()' in the 'Web Cryptography API' specification.
